Header: A cabinet sub committee to study report on Batticaloa campus
Content: The cabinet of Ministers has given approval to appoint a cabinet Sub Committee to study the report of the Sectoral Oversight Committee on Education and Human Resource Development in connection with the Batticaloa Campus Private Limited. The Chairman of the Sectoral Oversight Committee presented the report on the Batticaloa Campus Private Limited Institute to the Parliament recently.Â  The report has been subjected to the cabinet of Ministers and a Sub Committee was appointed to study it accordingly.
